tags.name: Attendance Management
tags.description: Operations related to employee attendance records

get.description: Retrieves a specific position's details using its unique ID. Accessible by employees and all higher-level roles.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing position using its unique ID. This action is restricted to users with the HR role.

delete.description: Deletes a position from the system using its unique ID. This action is irreversible and restricted to users with the HR role.

get.description: Retrieves a specific employee record using their unique ID. Accessible only to HR and Manager roles.

put.description: Updates the profile of a specific employee. Employees can only update their own profile. HR and Managers can update any employee's profile.

get.description: Retrieves a specific department's details using its unique ID. Accessible by employees and all higher-level roles.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing department using its unique ID. This action is restricted to users with the HR role.

delete.description: Deletes a department from the system using its unique ID. This action is irreversible and restricted to users with the HR role.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all employee salaries. This is a highly sensitive operation and is restricted to users with the HR role.

post.description: Creates a new salary record for an employee. This action is restricted to users with the HR role.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all positions. Accessible by employees and all higher-level roles.

post.description: Creates a new position in the system. This action is restricted to users with the HR role.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all performance review records. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

post.description: Creates a new performance review record for an employee. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all leave requests. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

post.description: Creates a new leave request for the authenticated employee. Accessible to all employees.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all departments. Accessible by employees and all higher-level roles.

post.description: Creates a new department in the system. This action is restricted to users with the HR role.
Creates a new user with HR role. Requires a valid JWT token with HR authority.
Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token for subsequent requests.
Allows a user to change their password using their old and new password. This method is public
Creates an attendance record manually for a given employee. Role restricted to HR/Manager.
Automatically registers check-out for the employee. Restricted to the employee themselves.
Automatically registers check-in for the employee. Restricted to the employee themselves.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all company announcements. Accessible to all employees.

post.description: Creates a new company announcement. Only HR users can perform this action.

get.summary: Get a performance review by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific performance review record using its unique ID. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

delete.summary: Delete a performance review by ID
delete.description: Deletes a performance review record by its unique ID. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

patch.summary: Update a performance review by ID
patch.description: Updates an existing performance review record. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.
Marks a specific notification as read for the authenticated user.
Marks all unread notifications as read for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get a single leave request by ID
get.description: Retrieves a single leave request by its unique ID. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

delete.description: Cancels an existing leave request. Only the requester can cancel their unapproved request.

patch.description: Updates an existing leave request. Only the requester can update an unapproved request.
Rejects a specific leave request. The approving user's ID is automatically captured. This action is restricted to HR and Manager roles.
Approves a specific leave request. The approving user's ID is automatically captured. This action is restricted to HR and Manager roles.

get.summary: Get a single attendance record by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific attendance record using its unique ID. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

delete.summary: Delete an attendance record by ID
delete.description: Deletes a specific attendance record using its unique ID. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

patch.summary: Update an attendance record by ID
patch.description: Updates an existing attendance record for an employee. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.

get.summary: Get a single salary record by ID
get.description: Retrieves a single salary record by its unique ID. This action is restricted to users with the HR role.

delete.description: Deletes an existing salary record. This action is restricted to users with the HR role.

get.description: Retrieves the salary history for the authenticated user only. This endpoint is secured and requires a valid JWT token.
Retrieves the salary history for a specific employee by ID. Accessible only to HR and Manager roles.
Retrieves a list of all performance review records for the authenticated user. Accessible to all employees.

get.summary: Get performance history for a specific employee
get.description: Retrieves a list of performance reviews for a specified employee by ID. This action is restricted to users with the HR or Manager role.
Retrieves a list of all notifications for the authenticated user. Accessible to all employees.

get.summary: Get employee's leave balance by ID
get.description: Retrieves the leave balance for a specific employee. Restricted to HR and Manager roles.
Retrieves a list of all leave requests for the authenticated user. Accessible to all employees.
Retrieves the leave balance for the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get all employees with pagination and filtering
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of employees with optional filtering
Retrieves the profile information for the currently authenticated employee. Accessible to all authenticated users (HR, Manager, and Employee).

get.summary: Get all employees for a department
get.description: Retrieves a list of all employees working in a specific department. Accessible to HR and Manager roles.
Returns a list of all attendance records.
Returns attendance records for the authenticated employee.
Retrieves the attendance history for a specific employee by ID. Accessible only to HR and Manager roles.
